website_summaries.verdict: Six-legged carport with a metal frame that gives you a large coverage area at a low price point.
pros: Versatile carport, as it's the perfect size for protecting your vehicle, as well as for using as shade for outdoor gatherings
Metal frame offers six legs to ensure maximum stability
Polyethylene canopy cover will stand up over time and resist ripping from age
Relatively easy to assemble when two people are involved
cons: May not stay in place well during heavy winds
Frame's strength is questionable in bad weather

customer_reviews.title: No go for snow!!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together for 1 person in just a few minutes. It took a 2nd person for 1 step, which was raising it up and putting 2 legs on. It is lightweight, sturdy, and it arrived quickly. The only reason it is not 5 stars is that the tie downs are sold separately and it is absolutely necessary to tie it down! I would definitely buy it again. 12-8-18 UPDATE: A month after setup we had our first snow, it didn't go well...granted it was a wet heavy snow but the canopy was completely destroyed. If you want to unhook the tarp before the snow then it will hold up, but what good is that?
customer_reviews.author: blu sky

customer_reviews.title: King Canopies are absolutely the best canvas canopies made, for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a King Canopy to park my F-150 truck under at out hunt/fish camp in 2014. I also bought (3) other cheaper made canvas canopies at the same time, to park my boats and 4 wheelers under. Four year later, my original king canopy still looks like new and my (3) cheap canopies have been torn up and blew down in the wind and rain. I just bought another King Canopy a few weeks ago for our camp. Going forward, I will only buy "King Canopies" for my outdoor "Covering Gear/Equipment" needs. Absolutely the best made canvas canopy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: randall c ramey

customer_reviews.title: working pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: We had to use cinder blocks to raise the height so it would be tall enough to cover our travel trailer. We anchored it down with ropes. We've had some strong winds and lots of rain recently here in Seattle area, and it's held up pretty good so far. Looks nice, and it wasn't too difficult to put together with the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Lind

customer_reviews.title: Great sun shade, fits my truck perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Set up is very simple with two people. It took about 30 minutes (going very slowly and being very meticulous). It is perfect for what I needed. I just bought a new truck (that is too long for my garage) and I wanted something to keep the noon sun, leaves, limbs and bird poop off my truck. This is perfect. I love the fact that you do not needs any tools to set the thing up.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Canopy for my driveway, it's the right size I'm just worried about the poles coming apart. The poles do not inter lock in any way and are not tight fitting there fore they slide right apart With a big wind gust the top could easily fly off. To remedy the problem for a quick fix to get it together my boyfriend put duck tape around all poles where they go together. we don't want to permanently put them together with a glue or adherent because that wouldn't leave us the option of taking it down for an impending hurricane. We live in south Fl.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: great tarp
customer_reviews.text: awesome canopy.....Ordered 2.....1 had small little "punch" holes on the tarp....just installed the 2nd and no holes visible. These are the best design due to the air space created on the bottom of the tarp and the poles...allowing the air to flow....awesome. The style w/out the valance along the edge. Thanks Amazon......not thrilled with the holes.....I'm sure it was just an oversight in factory...but I didn't pay for holes in the tarp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy!! We used it as a cover for two six foot tables at a graduation party and it was perfect! Keep in mind...it came without tie downs. One stiff wind and it would have taken off like a kite. We purchased the tie downs and they worked perfectly. I did think it was white...I guess just going by the picture ...but it is silver , with a black color underneath. Seemed sturdy and we would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Construction, *see my pictures* frame lasted month and a half.
customer_reviews.text: Beware Amazon Vendor - VMInnovations did not accept return or replacement ( had only 60 day exchange policy on expensive idem as this), and manufacture - JumpKing declined to honor 1 year replacement warranty claiming "the damage on your canopy seem to be weather related." It seem to me the Canopy - an outside use idem should be able to withstand its intended use for more than month and a half. Poor craftsmanship, we had mild weather so far - no debris, or heavy snow etc . etc. and each Canopy support leg was anchored to the ground for better support, despite this entire frame caved. Currently I am seeking arbitration with Amazon representative, and I will post an update.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kurtyko

customer_reviews.title: Review of King Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up,had a tiny hole we fixed, could be alot taller since my ford van in it is hard to get in and out,should have bolts and screw holes to connect legs to roof--could fly away
customer_reviews.author: carol hull

customer_reviews.title: Works great, as other reviewers said poles just slide together
customer_reviews.text: Works great, as other reviewers said poles just slide together. So my husband screwed them together at all connections, then used screws/bolts to attach feet to driveway. We had a major wind and rain storm couple weeks later and nothing moved. We are very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 years!!!
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple this canopy was worth it. Purchased in 2015 and finally replacing the cover after big wind storm. Easy to setup, cover fits nice and tight, never holds water from rain. Setup on driveway and added some weights. I live in SoCal so no snow but rain and blistering sun. Very happy it has lasted this long.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Goes together easy. We use it for our Boy Scout Troop, as a kitchen fly. We anchor the corners with Liberty Outdoor ANCFR10-ORG-A Folding Ring, from Liberty Hardware. Withstood 50 mph winds with no problem. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lance Anderson

customer_reviews.title: The canopy is very nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: The canopy is very nice and well made. The only thing we would have preferred is that the flanges for the legs would have been galvanized metal. They are plastic and we don't know how well they will do with the winds in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as a king brand canopy and that is why i bought it . What i received is something called a jump king which appears to be a knock off brand . The quality and design appears to be the same as the king brand canopy , Maybe it is the same thing ? I don't know yet . After i set it up and use it for a while i will update my review .
customer_reviews.author: EmmettMike

customer_reviews.title: I'm quite impressed with the durability. It's been up ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite impressed with the durability. It's been up for nearly 6 months thru monsoon rains, wind (30+ mph) and snow. I used concrete anchors in my driveway and rope to hold it in place. Only issue I've seen is several of the bungee straps have stretched from strong winds and will need to be replaced. But considering the price point it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul in NM

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as discribed in the reviews here on Amazon. I think this canopy is one of the cleaner looking temporary shelters. It was up in an hour from the box. It purchased King canopy 15" anchors and six cam over straps and anchored this bitch to the ground. It's wet and windy as we speak and it's still there. I'm happy happy happy.
customer_reviews.author: Todd T.

customer_reviews.title: Sides are only 70" off ground.
customer_reviews.text: Takes at least three people to assemble. All joints are only friction tight. Will come apart unless you drill holes (36) in every joint to insert pins/nails.
customer_reviews.author: lender 2

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS Trust King Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Out of many 10x20 canopies, I greatly admire king canopy the most. Easiest​ to set up and has really nice and thick metal legs.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Love the Canopy for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this canopy for camping and it worked out perfectly - family camping trips of 9 people or more every summer for a week or more. We put our picnic tables under the canopy and no longer needed to hang tarps from the trees to get cover from the rain. Seems to be good quality and I expect it will last us for years.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic frame & cover. Expect the cover to last three years when replacement is due. It's still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: G.E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value but short cables
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a good value but the cords are too short
customer_reviews.author: meanpeace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected....my purpose was to keep sap from pine trees off of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie.

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasted. I tried to push it through winter. Lasted a storm or two but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Alec B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these king canopies for a while for my business and to cover machinery. They are durable when secured to the ground. I replaced one after hurricane Irma in Sept 2017 and it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Israel P.

customer_reviews.title: very easy stop put together and set up
customer_reviews.text: very easy stop put together and set up. (My husband put the copy together himself, I helped get the legs in place.) My one caveat is that it is lightweight, can in a very big storm here (Central Texas) it was blown ito the neighbors yard.It didn't tear, or break, though. Just make sure you do some good anchoring,
customer_reviews.author: TxBoonies

customer_reviews.title: Holds up great in the wind
customer_reviews.text: stops oak leaves and sap off of car. Holds up great in the wind, I live in FL. we had a cold front come thru in Dec.. winds up to 90 mph Canopy held with no problem, When this one gets old we will get another.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Palmer

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: This item look better in the picture, the poles are thin and the base is made out of plastic, i call it Trash. I had to use sheet metal screws ti prevent it from sepatating. Not really good design.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Obryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great Canopy! These are the best portable canopies. They hold up to wind and sun better than any of the others. Go ahead and spend the extra $30 and save the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Will use a lot. Mostly for events.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast.Well packaged and price was great. Will definitely put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good price
customer_reviews.text: Durable, good material and easy to set up just remember to anchor really well , headroom on outside frame is little low but still good shade
customer_reviews.author: Jimz

customer_reviews.title: Very good canopy, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very good canopy, easy to assemble. The only down side it that the metal will rust if you live in a coastal area like South Texas. Would probably last forever if the metal parts were make with PVC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice size, easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my SUV with coverage to spare.Went up quickly
customer_reviews.author: majisafi

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had screws!
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was put together with screws - the poles slide into each other. Not that easy to put up....definitely a two man job.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Homan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Waikiki Easily assembled, but added 1/4"self tapping screw to all the joining leg areas to keep securely together
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Fairly easy to put up and secure
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Fairly easy to put up and secure. This product is very well made. I use it to cover my pop-up camper.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked out great for my week in the desert. sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Installed easily. I have had this for about 3 months to cover our boat. So far, we are very impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: mlkh04

customer_reviews.title: Canopy was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Canopy was easy to assemble. Took no more than 30 min to assemble with the help of a second person. If you plan on leaving it out permanently, definitely anchor it. Holds up fine with small winds but medium to heavy it starts rocking and the assy ends up having play in it.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Canopy for price, wished it came with stakes to secure though!!
customer_reviews.text: For price and quality can't go wrong! Used it in 90 degree weather and gave extra shade where we needed it! If there is one thing that it really should have came with is stakes to secure it. I bought for pet stakes at Wal-Mart to remedy the problem. Other than that it would have earned a five star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: This is the 2nd one I have purchased. The ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased. The first one came with all pieces. The 2nd one was missing the tie down rope. I had to go out and buy some rope before I could finish putting the canaopy up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is better than  i expected.
customer_reviews.text: This canopy was pretty easy to put up and came with all the instructions. However the poles have nothing keeping them in place and there are no pre drilled holes. And this did not come with anchors so i had tie it to some trees. Yesterday was a real windy day and it held up okay one of the poles kept coming out though.
customer_reviews.author: stevizzle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just make sure you attach parts with metal screws. They come apart if it gets windy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice top!
customer_reviews.text: The round anchors to hold the legs in place are made of thin plastic and two broke in the slightest wind. The rest is good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Arb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit like a glove heavy duty canvas rainforest corners bungee tie downs good quality excellent for the dollar
customer_reviews.author: signs1128

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, first small wind came and the whole thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, first small wind came and the whole thing crumpled...even with the extra legs I bought with it for extra security.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well fittings could be a little better fit but for the price pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: john rose

customer_reviews.title: Otherwisent it covers great.
customer_reviews.text: The connection joints are to short. Otherwisent it covers great.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and seems like a heavy duty canvas, Like the grey color.
customer_reviews.author: ACTaylor

customer_reviews.title: By far the best canopy I ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the best canopy I ever, I had this up agains 25 miles per hr winds and it held up like a champ. Very strong and durable !
customer_reviews.author: dangelo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and it keeps the sun of my car.
customer_reviews.author: HEM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Easy assembly, good quality tarp.
customer_reviews.author: hsnyder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and went up easily with help of our adult children. recommend anchors which we purchased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Could use a little better coating
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Could use a little better coating, some of the pieces arrived with surface rust but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great canopy. We ordered for office employee functions outside
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy. We ordered for office employee functions outside. One of our other offices ordered one too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Davis

customer_reviews.title: 10' x 20' 6-Leg King Canopy  King Canopy
customer_reviews.text: 10' x 20' 6-Leg King Canopy King Canopy was great went up fast easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: l84lnup

customer_reviews.title: So Good..
customer_reviews.text: So Far, So Good.... it's stood up to rain and snow, and some wind.
customer_reviews.author: cheriestein

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it so far
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and tarp and poles feel strong enough to hold for a while, except the plastic feet, we'll see, if it last a year I'll give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Pedro vargas

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be screwed together
customer_reviews.text: Blew down the second day in use. I drilled 1/8" holes at the pole joints and secured them with self-tapping metal screws and shifted over from the tarp to shade cloth..problems solved.
customer_reviews.author: CoyoteDave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This canopy was easy to set up and looks great. Just what I wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. My 2 sons and I
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. My 2 sons and I ...took ten minutes...Fabric reach about 2 inches short of the supports all around..For the money it was a good deal..
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Best Canopy for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Bought three of them for my business- they look clean and well made, unlike the cheaper ones you can buy at HD or places like that. So far, they have held up through a lot of storms.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for family events especially when rain is in the forecast and "sneaks up on you!"
customer_reviews.author: Doug Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The painted polls have oxidized badly in a short time becoming very chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: I order this for my husband he works outdoors needed some protection from Florida Sun we just had a bad rain and thunderstorm 3 days straight and it did no damage to the canopy it's still standing strong my husband says it feels 20 degrees cooler working up under it
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Great, strong
customer_reviews.text: Great, strong, temporary carport. I bought one to put across my driveway and am going to buy another and place them side by side and add a rain gutter down the center. Nice easy put together, solid top and legs. My neighbors have started copying this use! As soon as it is available again I AM BUYING A SECOND ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer neauxx  Chuck Charbonneau.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: exactly as expected, i even got it set up all by myself. I am 5' and with a little creativity, some cabling and hurricane tie downs it is withstanding wind, rain and FL weather just fine! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jetclectic

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good canopy for the price! Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: I would expect these to hold up MUCH better! VERy disappointing
customer_reviews.text: one of the legs SNAPPED off when it was windy! It wasn't that windy but it completely snapped off. I would expect these to hold up MUCH better! VERy disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Deruelle

customer_reviews.title: very good I made it into a patio for the back ...
customer_reviews.text: very good I made it into a patio for the back yard. I also tied it down in the event of strong winds
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it does looks good in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect to be this big, but it does looks good in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Present for my brother and he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Present for my brother and he loved it... needed a cover for in front of his house and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Update after a few months and sustained 40mph winds
customer_reviews.text: To wind proof it, I shortened the legs 20" and raised the structure with treated 4x4's in concrete. I changed out the plastic feet for metal ones and used in ground anchors and rope. The shortened legs make it more sturdy in the wind. Used lag screws and washers for the feet. each leg is anchored to the 4x4 with rope and an Eye bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Chalkley

customer_reviews.title: easy to put togeter
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together . I did it by myself and it took about half an hour. We use it for shade in kid's playground. Works great
customer_reviews.author: crcc

customer_reviews.title: ... the money haven't put it up yet weather not good were i am yet
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money haven't put it up yet weather not good were i am yet.
customer_reviews.author: scott kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Having had similar products before I generally knew what to expect and this product meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Haltiwanger

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was using this as a carport, and I weighted it down with 4 sixty-pound sandbags. It blew apart during the next thunderstorm. To be fair, the product's instructions said to take it down during windy conditions, but a storm is exactly when I want my car covered! To have an outdoor structure that can't withstand the elements completely destroys the whole purpose of buying this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kemper

product_meta.title: 10' x 20' 6-Leg King Canopy
product_meta.description: KMK1PCS Start protecting your valuables with canopies that provide shade and climate control while exhibiting strength and durability. The 6-Leg King Canopy is strong, portable and affordable. The King Canopy has become the consumer's favorite for providing vehicles protection against the sun and rain. This unit is also great for cookouts and storage. Features: -Silver cover -6 legged 1 3/8'' gray powder coated frame -Fittings are 17 gauge steel with an outside diameter of 1 1/2 inches Dimensions: -Side Height: 5'10'' H -Center Height: 8'11'' H -Base: 10'8'' W x 20' L Whether you need to cover a car, a dog or an outdoor party, you'll find the right canopy or portable shelter for the task in this Powell & Powell Supply Company catalog. All of our canopies, cabanas, greenhouses, pet shades, temporary and portable shelters feature study construction and high quality covers...the same qualities that have defined our products since the company was established in 1940. We take pride in being a family-owned, family-operated business with our fourth generation now coming onboard who work alongside us to provide fine products and outstanding customer service.
feature_bullets: Great for protecting vehicles against sun and rain, also cookouts and for storage6 legged 1 3/8" Gray powder coated frameSilver Cover10 ft. 8 in. W x 20 ft. LSide Height: 5 ft. 10 in.Center Height: 8 ft. 11 in.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars124 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
